item.title: 18000 cool jokes funny typo
item.description: ##09:17 Sunday 27 January 2013 Browsing through free apps, I found 18000 cool jokes. Its meta-data includes ——————————————— EXAMPLE JOKE FROM THE APP ——————————————— "If there are any idiots in the room, will they please stand up?" said the sarcastic teacher. After a long silence, one freshman rose to his feet. "Now then mister, why do you consider yourself an idiot?" enquired the teacher with a sneer "Well, actually I don't.
